summary: The video appears to be a promotional clip for 'The Daily Show,' a satirical news program hosted by Jon Stewart. It uses a comedic tone to comment on the divisive nature of election years, suggesting that the upcoming election will further polarize the audience. The voice-over humorously refers to the election year as 'guaranteed to divide us' and then contrasts this by stating, 'Finally, a second term we can all agree on,' implying a shared sentiment among viewers. The clip ends with promotional information for the show, airing on Mondays at 11 PM on Comedy Central and streaming the next day on Paramount+.
keywords: election year, divide, second term, agree, The Daily Show, Jon Stewart, Comedy Central, Paramount+, Mondays, 11 PM
